title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1\PreprocessingConfig\Crop
name: Crop
description:
Video cropping configuration for the input video. The cropped input video is scaled to match the output resolution.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1.PreprocessingConfig.Crop

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.top_pixels
params.description: The number of pixels to crop from the top. The default is 0.

params.name: data.bottom_pixels
params.description: The number of pixels to crop from the bottom. The default is 0.

params.name: data.left_pixels
params.description: The number of pixels to crop from the left. The default is 0.

params.name: data.right_pixels
params.description: The number of pixels to crop from the right. The default is 0.
